summary: Provides an integrationâ€‘test plugin for the OpenNebula cloud, handling the preparation of environment configuration and the initialization of a cloud provider that can operate with either a real OpenNebula setup or predefined test fixtures.
business_intent: Facilitate Ansible integration tests that target OpenNebula by automatically configuring the test environment and selecting the appropriate provider implementation, ensuring tests can run against actual clouds or simulated data without manual setup.
